author: sebor
msg: * sstream.cc (str): Avoided setting (pptr() == epptr()) except in
input mode as required (see lwg issue 562 for clarification). See
seeking on objects constructed in out mode so as not to assume that
(pptr() == epptr()) holds after the construction of the stream (in
fact, (pptr() == pbase()) is required to hold -- see lwg issue 562

author: fuzzylogic
msg: DERBY-1032: Allow new scripts to run on MKS.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-523.  Fix a NullPointerException when TextInputFormat is explicitly specified.  Contributed by Owen.

msg: moderately working authz on many of the important jsp pages and improvements in the corresponding actions
